titleStmt.title: Tyrants and protectors set forth in their colours. Or, The difference between good and bad magistrates; in several characters, instances and examples of both. / By J.P.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Citizen of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Cripps and L. Lloyd, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: J.P. = John Price, an anagram of whose name ("Cri in hope") appears on E1v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
